articles.title: Italy cancels Venice Carnival in bid to halt spread of virus
articles.description: Italian authorities have announced they are shutting down Venice's famed carnival events in a bid to stop the spread of the novel virus, as numbers of infected persons in the country have soared to at least 133, the largest amount of cases outside Asia
articles.content:

articles.title: Turkey closes borders with Iran over coronavirus concerns
articles.description: Turkey's health minister says the border with Iran will be closed due to the number of coronavirus cases in its eastern neighbor
articles.content:
ANKARA, Turkey -- 
Turkey's health minister said the border with Iran would be closed from Sunday due to the number of coronavirus cases in its eastern neighbor.
